full_summary:
### Educational Services - Nova Institution

### Professional Title
Competitive Bid for Providing Educational Services at Nova Institution for Women

### Receipt of Bid Invitation
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) invites interested bidders to submit a proposal for the provision of educational services at Nova Institution, a women’s correctional facility. The successful bidder will be responsible for delivering educational programs to the inmates.

### Key Objective
The objective of this contract is to facilitate the reintegration of women detainees through education, with a focus on accredited programs that cater to the diverse needs of the inmates.

### Statement of Work
The successful bidder will be required to deliver:

* Three (3) full-time and part-time teachers/instructors, with one of the instructors being bilingual and able to teach in both English and French.
* Adult Basic Education (ABE) programs, adapted ABE programs, educational programs leading to the Adult High School Diploma, and other education programs as requested by the Project Authority.
* Coordination of post-secondary pre-requisite courses, correspondence courses, and other programs.
* Providing provincially recognized certificates to inmates upon completion of their programs.

### Evaluation Criteria
The bidder's proposal will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Technical merit
* Price

### Important Dates

* Period of Contract: January 1, 2024 to December 31, 2024, with an option to renew for two (2) additional one-year periods.
* Tender Closing Date: October 23, 2023 at 13:00:00

### How to Bid
To obtain the complete statement of work and evaluation criteria, interested bidders can download the solicitation document and associated documents from the Canada Buy and Sell/Tenders website.
